name: Rat.castHom_rat
initialProofState: ⊢ Eq (Rat.castHom Rat) (RingHom.id Rat)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem castHom_rat : castHom ℚ = RingHom.id ℚ :=
  RingHom.ext cast_id

name: Rat.cast_pos_of_pos
initialProofState:
q : Rat
K : Type u_5
inst✝ : LinearOrderedField K
hq : LT.lt 0 q
⊢ LT.lt 0 ↑q
decl:
theorem cast_pos_of_pos (hq : 0 < q) : (0 : K) < q := by
  rw [Rat.cast_def]
  exact div_pos (Int.cast_pos.2 <| num_pos.2 hq) (Nat.cast_pos.2 q.pos)

name: Rat.cast_strictMono
initialProofState:
K : Type u_5
inst✝ : LinearOrderedField K
⊢ StrictMono Rat.cast
decl:
@[mono]
theorem cast_strictMono : StrictMono ((↑) : ℚ → K) := fun p q => by
  simpa only [sub_pos, cast_sub] using cast_pos_of_pos (K := K) (q := q - p)

name: Rat.cast_mono
initialProofState:
K : Type u_5
inst✝ : LinearOrderedField K
⊢ Monotone Rat.cast
decl:
@[mono]
theorem cast_mono : Monotone ((↑) : ℚ → K) :=
  cast_strictMono.monotone

name: Rat.castOrderEmbedding_apply
initialProofState:
K : Type u_5
inst✝ : LinearOrderedField K
a✝ : Rat
⊢ Eq (Rat.castOrderEmbedding a✝) ↑a✝
decl:
/-- Coercion from `ℚ` as an order embedding. -/
@[simps!]
def castOrderEmbedding : ℚ ↪o K :=
  OrderEmbedding.ofStrictMono (↑) cast_strictMono

name: Rat.cast_le
initialProofState:
p q : Rat
K : Type u_5
inst✝ : LinearOrderedField K
⊢ Iff (LE.le ↑p ↑q) (LE.le p q)
decl: @[simp, norm_cast] lemma cast_le : (p : K) ≤ q ↔ p ≤ q := castOrderEmbedding.le_iff_le

initialProofState:

⊢ Iff (LT.lt ↑p ↑q) (LT.lt p q)
decl: @[simp, norm_cast] lemma cast_lt : (p : K) < q ↔ p < q := cast_strictMono.lt_iff_lt

decl: @[gcongr] alias ⟨_, _root_.GCongr.ratCast_le_ratCast⟩ := cast_le

initialProofState:
K : Type u_5
inst✝ : LinearOrderedField K
m : Rat
n : Nat
⊢ Iff (LE.le ↑m ↑n) (LE.le m ↑n)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem cast_le_natCast {m : ℚ} {n : ℕ} : (m : K) ≤ n ↔ m ≤ (n : ℚ) := by
  rw [← cast_le (K := K), cast_natCast]

name: NNRat.cast_strictMono
initialProofState:
K : Type u_5
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield K
⊢ StrictMono NNRat.cast
decl:
theorem cast_strictMono : StrictMono ((↑) : ℚ≥0 → K) := fun p q h => by
  rwa [NNRat.cast_def, NNRat.cast_def, div_lt_div_iff₀, ← Nat.cast_mul, ← Nat.cast_mul,
    Nat.cast_lt (α := K), ← NNRat.lt_def]
  · simp
  · simp

name: NNRat.cast_mono

inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield K
⊢ Monotone NNRat.cast
decl:

theorem cast_mono : Monotone ((↑) : ℚ≥0 → K) :=
  cast_strictMono.monotone
